title: Hamburg High School (Hamburg, New York)
text:
Hamburg High School is a public <a href="secondary%20school">secondary school</a> in <a href="Hamburg%20%28village%29%2C%20New%20York">Hamburg</a>, <a href="Erie%20County%2C%20New%20York">Erie County</a>, <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a>, United States. Hamburg High School has approximately 1,300 students in grades 9-12. The mascot of Hamburg High School is the <a href="bulldog">bulldog</a>, and the school colors are <a href="purple">purple</a> and <a href="white">white</a>. Their chief athletic rivals are the cross-town <a href="Frontier%20High%20School%20%28New%20York%29">Frontier Falcons</a>, <a href="Orchard%20Park%20High%20School">Orchard Park Quakers</a>, and <a href="Lake%20Shore%20High%20School%20%28New%20York%29">Lake Shore Eagles</a>.
History.
